Summary: Driving down Route 130s to see fireballs in the sky
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Camden
There were no other sightings in Camden on or around December 23rd 2012
divs: sighting detailsi was driving down route 130 south heading from pennsauken to camden when i looked up in the air and saw 4-7 fireballs in the sky. my friend was in the car with me and i pointed them out. we've never seen anything like it before and i'm an avid ufo sky watcher. the glowed the color orange\fire just like a candle and flicker like a candle would. traffic was backed up so we had a good 10 minutes look on them. the seems to appear to sway back and forth and in all directions inbetween. there was no sound, as we thought they were helicopters. i felt so happy to have seen these "fireball" ufos that have been described not only in modern history but also history that dates back thousands and thousands of year. i lost sight of the objects when i had to continue to drive.
